Html:
I have a working incoming UDP audio stream being routed to a WaveOut device. I would like
to pass the incoming audio to a buffer instead of the WaveOut device, so that I can pass the buffer to another already coded DSP engine, using pointers to the buffer. The buffer would act as a kind of FIFO. There is a lot to absorb with regards to the available interfaces in NAudio. Anyone have a suggestion what the signal chain items would be for this application. Regards, Karin
PS: Anyone have any idea when this site will be migrated????
